actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 101-307.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 577.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee substitute as amended agreed to by Voice Vote.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to amend Title V of the Act of December 19, 1980, designating the Chaco Culture Archaeological Protection Sites, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Chacoan Outliers Protection Act of 1990 - Adds specified Navajo archeological protection sites to the Chaco Culture National Historical Park, New Mexico. Adds historic and cultural sites in southwestern Colorado including Petroglyph National Monument, to the Masau Trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title V of the Act of December 19, 1980, designating the Chaco Culture Archaeological Protection Sites, and for other purposes.
